value.title: Is MANY TO MANY, too many? | Power BI many to many relationships explained

value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI. value.title: Dynamic labels in Power BI using DAX
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick uses a little DAX, and the SelectedValue function, to get you some dynamic labels in your Power BI reports.
